msbt.message: About time I found you! I got somethin' to give you. Any guesses what it is?If you guessed "a festive wreath," you win the prize! The prize is a festive wreath.
Perfect for door-decorating, right? You can get your place lookin' cool in time for Toy Day, .
Huh? Yo, you know you're walkin' around with full pockets? Makes it hard to give you stuff, .I'll hang onto this for now. Figure out your pocket situation, and come back for it later, OK? Seeya!
